column4: Hey i just installed ubuntu and have like 2 questions that have to do with the GRUB, can anyone help me?
ok 1.) My up and down keys don't work so i cant select Windows, Im dual booting                        2.) How can i edit the GRUB so it automatically runs windows?
ok so can anyone help me?
2) to change grub's default OS, change 'default' in /boot/grub/menu.lst
